comment: More features equals a more confusing interface. I loved this app, no longer 冒聼聵聻. My present beef is that starting listening to a playlist creates a quasi queue that then cannot be cleared, which is seriously annoying on Android Auto when the music plays whenever I start the car. Please let me clear the playback of playlists without playing something else. And yes, I have reinstalled the app.
key sentence: queue, Android Auto, clear playback of playlists
the function of activity: The activity involves searching, library function, playing/pausing items, viewing downloaded songs/podcasts, downloading songs or podcasts, adding to playlists, shuffling a playlist, connecting to devices, previewing episodes, type replies to episodes and accessing history page, setting page
the sub-task list of state: [{'name': 'Input Query', 'description': 'Enter a search query'}, {'name': 'Now Playing Bar', 'description': 'Display the currently playing track'}, {'name': 'Add to Playlist', 'description': 'Add item to playlist'}, {'name': 'Play/Pause', 'description': 'Toggle between play and pause'}]
